name: Thayers Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Facial Mist Toner with Aloe Vera, Rose Petal, Soothing and Hydrating, For All Skin Types, 8 oz
short_description: Gentle Face Mist: Alcohol-free and formulated to soothe, tone, hydrate, refresh, rejuvenate, and balance the pH level of skin
Cult Favorite Formula: Experience Thayers beloved refreshing Facial Toner in conveniently-sized face mist bottle, use anywhere, use anytime, for all skin types
98 Percent Natural Origin Ingredients: Made with certified organic Witch Hazel grown and harvested exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Connecticut, and certified organic Aloe Vera

Unique Formulation: Thayers Witch Hazel extract is farm-to-bottle. It's picked by hand and made the old-fashioned way (via maceration) using water only and NEVER touching alcohol; Dermatologist tested for safety and 100 Percent cruelty free

Time Tested Remedies: We're committed to excellence with our formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries; Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why
product_description: Elevate your skincare routine with Thayers Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Facial Mist, your one step prep for better-looking bare skin. Our formula visibly reduces the appearance of pores, provides all day hydration and smooths skin texture. Leveraging the potent power of medicinal plants and derm actives, our pure-grade alcohol-free witch hazel and aloe vera soothes and balances while glycerin immediately hydrates and draws moisture to the skin. With nourishing natural ingredients, our mists can be used in countless ways. Tired of razor burn? Soothe irritation with Thayers. Prepping for a full face of glam? Our toner has you covered. Do your nails need a refresh? Thayers cleanses nails before a mani. Dealing with sunburns, bug bites or fresh ink? This formula calms discomfort naturally. Thayers is backed by science to level up your skincare.

short_description: [Milky Hydration & Moisturizing Toner] Soft, milky-textured toner that delivers deep hydration and leaves skin feeling smooth, supple, and refreshed.
[Strengthens Skin Barrier] Formulated with Panthenol and Ceramide to help defend against external stressors and soothe dry or sensitive skin.
[Preps Skin for Better Absorption] Infused with Niacinamide to even out skin tone and enhance moisture retention for healthy-looking skin.
[Soothing & Nourishing Ingredients] Contains Rice Bran Extract and Chamomile Flower to calm, nourish, and comfort the skin.
[Gentle for All Skin Types] Alcohol-free and cruelty-free. Suitable for dry, oily, and sensitive

[Milky Cream Mist Texture] Rich, lotion-like hydration in a lightweight jar of cream transformed into a refreshing and hydrating spray mist.

name: AESTURA ATOBARRIER365 Cream Mist with 10,000ppm Ceramides | Moisture Barrier Support, Ultra-Fine Moisturizing Mist, Suitable for Dry Skin, 120ML / 4.06 fl.oz.
short_description: HIGH CERAMIDE CONCENTRATION FOR DEEP HYDRATION: Formulated with 10,000ppm of ceramides, this mist strengthens the skin’s moisture barrier and delivers long-lasting hydration—perfect for soothing and protecting dry, chapped winter skin.
TRIPLE LIPID COMPLEX: A powerful blend of ceramides, fatty acids, and cholesterol helps strengthen the skin barrier, locking in moisture and protecting against external aggressors.

ULTRA-FINE SPRAY FOR EVEN APPLICATION: This hydrating face mist features a superfine spray that delivers an even layer of moisture. Ideal for all skin types, ensures lightweight hydration without disrupting makeup.
CONVENIENT HYDRATION ON-THE-GO: Ideal for quick hydration boosts, this mist revitalizes dry skin anytime, anywhere, ensuring the skin stays hydrated throughout the day.
DERM-TESTED & SAFE FOR DAILY USE: Dermatologist-tested and allergy-tested, this face mist is free of fragrance, colorants, and mineral oils. Use anytime for instant hydration and barrier support.

name: medicube Jelly Mist Serum with Pink PDRN Collagen | Dual-Texture Glow Spray with Niacinamide, Glutathione, Ceramide, Hyaluronic Acid | for Hydration, Radiance, Plump-Looking Skin | 3.38 fl.oz
short_description: [Dual-Texture Innovation for Every Glow] A unique jelly-mist formula that combines the power of a serum with the convenience of a mist. Adjust the spray distance to switch between a rich serum mist for deep care or a fine mist for a lightweight glow.

[Quick Hydration, Lasting Radiance] Enriched with 99% purity Salmon PDRN and Collagen, this dual-texture formula delivers quick hydration and a lasting dewy glow — leaving skin plump, smooth, and radiant anytime, anywhere.
[Innovative Jelly Textured Serum & Mist] Formulated with an optimal 1:9 oil-to-jelly ratio to keep ingredients potent and skin luminous — no stickiness, just lasting hydration and glow.
[Glow-Enhancing Complex] Niacinamide, Glutathione, Ceramide, and Hyaluronic Acid work together to boost clarity, strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, and keep skin hydrated and smooth.
[On-The-Go Glow] Lightweight, travel-friendly mist designed for morning prep, mid-day refresh, or post-workout glow. Fits perfectly in your daily routine.

[How to Use] For serum-like care, shake and spray close for a richer texture that absorbs deeply. For a mist-like refresh, spray from 10–20 cm away for a soft, even layer of hydration and radiance. Use whenever skin feels dull or dehydrated for a quick boost of firmness and glow.

name: Aqua Phytoplex Cream in Toner Mist Long Lasting Deep Hydration, All-in-One Facial Mist for All Skin Type Unscented Clean Beauty, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Korean Skincare (60ml / 2.02 oz)
short_description: [Instant Hydration Facial Mist] : This Cream in toner mist offers instant hydration throughout the day. It spreads evenly over the skin and immediately moisturize the dry skin

[AQUA PHYTOPLEX] : Aqua phtyoplex is irecipe’s proprietary ingredients developed by micronizing ingredients at high pressure after fusing 4 types of natural oil – Meadowfoam Seed, Sunflower Seed, Canola and Argan.
[Fast Absorption] : Aqua Phytoplex is 1/400 size of the skin pore. It quickly absorbs and deeply penetrates into the skin and delivers moisture.
[Long-lasting Moisture] : It provides long-lasting moisturizing effect for up to 24 hours which improves your skin hydration and stops your skin from becoming dry.

[irecipe’s Clean Beauty] : This product is EVE Vegan Certified. It is hypoallergenic tested and also FREE of Paraben, Silicone, Phenoxyethanol, Ethanol and Mineral oil which may irritate sensitive skin.

name: Prequel Skin Multi-Quench Hydration Mist – Moisturizing Face Spray with Plumping PGA Complex, Glycerin, Aloe & More – Hydrating Facial Spray with Niacinamide for Smoother Skin – Fine Mist Humectant
short_description: SUPER HYDRATOR: Multi-molecular weight polyglutamic acid enhances moisture retention in this innovative humectant-rich spray for a weightless veil of hydration and a plump, radiant complexion.
SMOOTH, TOUCHABLE SKIN: Features stable niacinamide (Vitamin B3) to smooth texture, visibly brighten tone, and lock in moisture for skin that looks and feels touchably soft.
BARRIER SUPPORT: Glycerin and Aloe osmolytes soothe, hydrate, and support skin barrier function while improving the look of elasticity—light mist sprays evenly for non-sticky absorption.
LAYERABLE: Locks in lightweight hydration for under-makeup prep or on-the-go moisture—helps soothe, balance, and visibly plump skin while supporting elasticity and product absorption.
GENTLE FOR ALL: Fragrance-free, pH-stabilized, safe for dry, oily, or sensitive skin. Patch test recommended. Prequel Skin, Dermatologist Developed, Clinically Tested, Proven Skincare.
